channel.title: flask-web-service on Abhishek Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in flask-web-service on Abhishek Sharma

item.title: nyctaxiservice
item.description: This is an example of a web service which exposes the data in a google big-query table as a web service. Currently it provides 3 endpoints which help to query data present in the NYC Taxi Dataset. You can find the source code of the application here. I will deploy a live working app soon.
